text: Labelle is an American all-female singing group who were a popular vocal group of the 1960s and 1970s. The founding members were Patti LaBelle (formerly Patricia Holt), Cindy Birdsong, Nona Hendryx, and Sarah Dash. The group members each went on their own after the end of a tour in 1976. ==References== ==Other websites== * Labelle interview by Pete Lewis, 'Blues & Soul' June 2009 Category:American funk musicians Category:American R&B; bands Category:American soul musicians Category:American rock bands
title: Labelle
